NPC ID5252

Ifaba is a monkey that runs the general store on Ape Atoll. His wares are similar to those of other general stores.

One of the monkey greegrees and a Monkeyspeak amulet must be equipped to talk to him, but the amulet is not required to use the shop by using the trade option on him.

This shop can be thieved with at least 5 Thieving, but it is highly risky. Interestingly, the tinderbox on his stall is white rather than the usual grey. He does not sell white tinderboxes, however, only the regular grey ones.
